title: RomCom Exploits Zero-Day Firefox and Windows Flaws in Sophisticated Cyberattacks
description: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as RomCom has been linked to the zero-day exploitation of two security flaws, one in Mozilla Firefox and the other in Microsoft Windows, as part of attacks designed to deliver the eponymous backdoor on victim systems.
